entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
